alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:08PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oglala Lakota County through 600 PM MDT... At 508 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Number 4, or 11 miles northwest of Pine Ridge, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Ridge, Oglala, Manderson, Wounded Knee, Number 4, South Lakeside, Wakpamni, Calico, Wolf Creek Housing, Porcupine Butte Housing and southwestern Pine Ridge Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern South Dakota.
